infos.value: What would you have us do now, Queen Helena?
We should make haste for Anvil Castle.
Anvil Castle, Your Highness? You don't wish to follow King Oelde?
Anvil Castle... That was the main residence of the previous king, as I recall?
Yes... It is also close to the border of Fennes.
That castle is abandoned. I fear it will be little more than a ruin.
There are still several relics hidden beneath it.
If we possessed more ancient relics, might we be able to turn the tide of this war...!?
As I said, let us make haste for Anvil Castle.
